mapper.insert: insert into t_shipped_head(tracking_number, transfer_company, submit_time, postage, create_date) values(#{trackingNumber}, #{transferCompany}, #{submitTime}, #{postage}, now())
mapper.select: select id, tracking_number, transfer_company, submit_time, postage, create_date, date_format(create_date, '%Y年%m月%d日 %T') as createDateFormat from t_shipped_head where tracking_number = #{trackingNumber}
